vote.title: Appointment of Marc Reitter, President and COO, AEP Ohio, 1 Riverside Plz., Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve on the Central Ohio Regional Transit Authority Board of Trustees, with a new term expiration date of March 31, 2026 (biography attached).

Appointment of Marc Reitter, President and COO, AEP Ohio, 1 Riverside Plz., Columbus, Ohio 43215, to serve on the Central Ohio Regional Transit Authority Board of Trustees, with a new term expiration date of March 31, 2026 (biography attached).
